Literature.Title: Tuning hydrophobicity of highly cationic tetradecameric Gramicidin S analogues using adamantane amino acids.
Literature.Author: Knijnenburg AD, Kapoerchan VV, Spalburg E, de Neeling AJ, Mars-Groenendijk RH, Noort D, van der Marel GA, Overkleeft HS, Overhand M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml)
